column4: Latest;Phnom Penh: According to preliminary reports
column6: massage parlors businesses which have reopened
column7: despite orders from the government to prevent the spread of COVID-19.------On the night of May 21st
column8: the Daun Penh district authority led by Mr. Sok Penh Vuth
column10: took a force of 4 teams to advise and contract businesses on measures to prevent the spread of COVID-19
column11: and warned they may be closed if they do not follow the instructions.------Authorities are now investigating clubs
column12: karaoke and massage parlors that have reopened. ------KOHSANTEPHEAP
